keyword: how many calories in whisky shot
title: How Many Calories in a Whisky Shot?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in whisky shot, including full nutrition breakdown, alcohol content, and variations for mixers or doubles.
h1: How Many Calories in a Whisky Shot?
assumptions: Standard 1.5 oz (44 ml) shot of 40% ABV whisky; straight, no mixers or ice.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof (ABV), shot size, and any additions; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard whisky shot contains about 97 calories, primarily from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a whisky shot?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 kcal for a standard 1.5 oz shot of 40% ABV whisky.

faqs.q: Does whisky have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No, straight whisky has 0 g carbs, fiber, and sugars—all calories from alcohol.

faqs.q: How does shot size affect calories in whisky?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volume; a 1 oz shot is ~65 kcal, while 2 oz is ~130 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there fats or protein in whisky?
faqs.a: Zero fat and protein; it's pure alcohol with negligible other nutrients.

faqs.q: What about calories in whisky with mixer?
faqs.a: Add-ons like cola or ginger ale increase calories—e.g., +50 kcal for 4 oz cola.
